trends: There have been 61 other sightings in Kokomo
There was one other sighting in Kokomo on or around April 18th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving home at about 9:00 pm around the second week in april of this year,2009. Grissom AFB is close by so I am used to seeing aircraft. Never in my life have I seen anything in the sky like I witnessed that night. When I seen it I said aloud, Neat! While driving I noticed a single white strobing light, which is normal. All the sudden about six to eight horizonal lights in a row appeared in a straight line where the strobing light was. Then it dissapeared. Is there some new aircraft never before seen is the sky?
